content.rendered:
Providing Innovative Solutions for Your Aircraft

SteerClear is a nose wheel steering modification for Bombardier CRJ operators that protects the NWS module’s internal components from dust, debris and liquid spills. SteerClear is an exclusive solution from Professional Aircraft Accessories.

Steer Clear of Dust, Debris and Downtime
  • 98% coverage of the NWS module—reducing the exposure of contaminants to the unit
  • Spill sleeve prevents liquids from entering the Tiller shaft
  • Enclosure increases rigidity of the unit resulting in better test times and readings
  • Exchange Program ensures little downtime while the unit is being is installed
